name: desktop-avatar
description: The new/server version of the Salesbox Desktop Avatar

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run parcel-build
scripts.parcel-build: npm run copy && parcel build src/*.html --dist-dir pub --public-url=./
scripts.parcel-watch: npm run copy && parcel serve -p 3001 src/*.html --dist-dir pub
